alert.note: Alert for Barbour (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 09 at 5:23AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN BARBOUR COUNTY... At 522 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Lakepoint Resort State Park, or near Eufaula, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Lakepoint Resort State Park, Hawkinsville, Lugo and Twin Springs. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
